dimLevel.description: The text shown next to the range input in the popup window.

allTabs.description: Shown in the popup window: Apply settings to: All tabs

thisTabOnly.description: Shown in the popup window: Apply settings to: This tab only

optionalPermissions.description: The section title in the Preferences tab.

enableHostPermissions.description: Text of the relevant checkbox in the Preferences tab.

enableHostPermissionsDescription.message: This permission allows dimmer to keep the tab dimmed after you visit a different website or refresh the same tab. Otherwise you will have to manually re-dim the page.

enableTabsPermission.description: Text of the relevant checkbox in the Preferences tab.

enableTabsPermissionDescription.message: This permission allows dimmer to get the URLs of each tab and show a different (disabled) logo when the browser doesn't allow dimmer to run (e.g. on Mozilla Add-ons pages).

enableWebRequestPermissions.message: Enable request monitoring and request blocking permissions
enableWebRequestPermissions.description: Text of the relevant checkbox in the Preferences tab.

enableWebRequestPermissionsDescription.message: These permissions allow dimmer to intercept PDF requests and redirect them to a custom PDF viewing page where you can dim the PDF. (Firefox doesn't allow add-ons to modify built-in PDF viewer data)

settings.description: The section title in the Preferences tab.

dimAllTabs.message: Dim all tabs when a tab is dimmed
dimAllTabs.description: Text of the relevant checkbox in the Preferences tab.

dontAllow.description: Radio button label for Don't Allow
